participant_1.background:

My weight is not an issue for me

i ve been in a relationship for 2 years.

participant_2.background:
Fishing with my dad was one of the best times I had growing up.
I wake up early to get a head start on my day.
I used to lie to my parents, but now I am more honest with them.
I'm not worried about the weather because I have to be ready for any condition when I fly.
i am an angry person.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking.  How about yourself?
I am doing good as well.  I just spent my birthday alone, relaxing at home.
Oh, well happy belated birthday!  What did you do to celebrate?
I ordered my favorite take out food and watched some movies.  It was pretty low key, but I enjoyed it.
That sounds like a great way to spend a birthday.  I used to lie to my parents when I was younger, but now I am more honest with them.
I am not an angry person, so I am not sure how I would handle that.  I am glad that you are more honest with them now.
I am glad that you are not an angry person.  I am an angry person, but I am working on it.
That's good to hear.  I hope you are able to overcome your anger.
